content.detailedDescription: I was driving my car on interstate 80 heading eastbound. between the dubois,penfield exits i notice an object coming towards 80 from my car. the object was heading from my passenger side of car. above the trees, from my right ,flying towards my left, over all lanes of highway. i looked up at it , i noticed it was all solid black. i looked for wings ,none, no tail fins either. i looked for windows none,no writing on it either. the first thing that entered my mine was what is that. im driving trying to watch it also. i looked around to see if other cars were near me seeing this. i felt there was nobody around. i looked towards the westbound lane and watch the cars and this object flying over head.It just vanished over the horizon.The shape of object was long or cylinder shaped.The object seem to have the length of 2 tractor trailor's end to end or a bit longer. then shortly after that a jet appeared. flying same direction chasing it. the object and jet didn't seem to be flying super sonic,real fast.It appeared that this jet was on hot pursuit. the jet seemed to fly same height and speed as this object. the object seemed to keep a steady speed. when the object disappeared from my sight,the jet appeared. my mine is racing trying to capture every detail of it and drive. i know what i saw, a black cylinder shaped object with no wings ,motor or windows or writing on it. no comparison to even a goodyear blimp. the object was more slender than a blimp.I was driving by my self. i was thinking of taking a picture with my cell phone,it didn't happen. i sure wish i would of had somebody with me that day. i would of had a fantastic picture and close up. the weather was real nice that day, sunny.For now on i will keep a loaded camera in the car.
content.summary: Black cylinder no wings no tail wings no lettering no windows

content.detailedDescription: I walked out on my back porch and noticed a bright, blue bulb that literally appeared to be glowing as it briskly moved through the sky for about five seconds before "burning out". i kept thinking it might be a meteorite without a streak? it was definitely too low to be a star, and it made no noise. i saw several (4-5) planes flying in the general area although much higher at the same time.
content.summary: Glowing blue, orb-like sphere that seemed to "burn out" and go dark seconds later

content.detailedDescription: Saw a bright luminesent orange redish light heading west over orcutt road when driving west on said road,appearing to  slowly head out in the distance straight away but getting to the horizon the light then seemed to wobble or make small circles left and right,also at that time an airplane passed overhead slightly south and much higher than the object obviously an airplane.The light then decended or went west over the horizon.
content.summary: Saw a bright orange redish light very luminesent slowly apper to be heading west above orcutt rd

content.detailedDescription: Driving west on rt 41, about to get onto i-75 south. nice sunny afternoon, no clouds or anything else in the sky. as i was approaching the traffic light to get on 75, an object in the sky caught my eye through my windshield, west and slightly south of my position. first thought was a plane. dayton intl airport and wright-patt afb nearby, see planes all the time. quickly realized it wasn't a plane. maybe a helicopter, i thought? definitely not, because it would definitely have been close enough to see the typical features, but this was only a sphere. it seemed a little hard to focus on, not sure if due to distance or some other factor, but it seemed just slightly out of focus. not blurry, per se, but a very slight haze. i could see enough that it looked like a gray/sivler metallic surface that reflected the bright sunlight. saw no features like windows or anything else. having no idea of the actual size of the thing, it's really tough to guess at distance from me. as i looked at it i fully expected it to become apparent that it was something i would recognize as it turned, got closer, or something. but it just seemed to stay stationary, with no apparent motion and never changing from a sphere shape. as as idea of the size of what i saw, when you see the moon during the day, i would say if you put this object in front of it in the sky, the object would have covered nearly a quarter of the diameter of the moon. it wasn't a tiny spec, there was something in the sky that i had never seen before. i looked at it for maybe as long as 8 seconds, then shifted focus to traffic as i came to a stop at the traffic light. my 10-year-old daughter was with me and as i came to a stop i intended to joke with her like "hey it looks like a ufo up there" because as i said i expected it to become something ordinary. maybe 2-4 seconds after taking my eyes off of it, we were stopped at the light and i looked up again, ready to make my ufo joke. it was gone and left no sign behind it. again, it wasn't a spec that i just couldn't track down again. it was a definite, visible, sizeable object that would've been easy to relocate if it was anything i'm used to seeing. i looked hard, and continued to look over that entire area of the sky as i got onto 75. nothing. nada. completely gone. didn't see it fly away, vanish, etc., so i don't know what it did, but it was completely gone just a couple seconds after i had watched it hover for a number of seconds. didn't mention it to my daughter because i knew she hadn't seen anything. just kept thinking it over as i continued driving, realizing i had just seen something highly unusual and unexplainable. just fyi, while open to the idea there could be "others" i've never seen anything like this before, nor do i spend much time thinking about it or gazing at the sky. but this thing caught my attention and there is no way i can write it off.
content.summary: Hovering sphere near troy oh

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my friend were on the park when a group of 5 or 6 lights apered sw of my position going nw after 30 seconds another 4 lights apeared following the first group.

these lights were moving at rather high speed if compared to an airplane, and moving in no aparent formation at times the lights came closer one to another and the next moment they separate. the lights seemed to be climbing.

the event lasted around 30 mins from 6.40pm to 7.10pm (colombia time)

during the event i felt amazed but fearless of the sight. i lose contact with the objects when as they kept their path on nw direction
content.summary: Lights in the night sky (no clouds)

content.detailedDescription: Estaba saliendo de una casa con mi papa,cuando vi al cielo pude ver 3 rojas como con anaranjado.Pero cuando nos alejamos mas de la casa vimos 15 luces aproximadamente, que se movian lento pero en formacion. luego de caminar un poco mas lejos de la casa vimos a mas personas viendo el suceso que estaba pasando. despues de vimos al cielo o traves y alcansamos a ver las luces quietas que formavan un triangulo, apenas vimos la formacion en triangulo a los 2 minutos desaparecieron las luces.
content.summary: Eran como luces en el cielo .

content.detailedDescription: Saturday feb. 18th. 8:22 pm directly above palm coast, florida. 85 degrees from the horizon, i witnessed a stationary, bright golden(or yellow)orb slightly larger than the largest visible star via the naked eye, above a nearby passing passenger airliner, ascend straight up until it was no longer visible, towards what seemed to be just a few degrees(2-5) north of what i believe to be the orion's belt constellation from my viewpoint. the sighting lasted about 10 seconds.
content.summary: Golden orb above palm coast, florida ascended out of sight

content.detailedDescription:
To my right was a star like object, appearing then disappearing, glowing brighter then diminish, emmited a light that almost appeared as though the light emmited had "walked away" from original light. it was chevron shaped when it glowed, yellow in the middle outlined in red. to my left suddenly appeared another flickering star light that ascended to the sky towards my direction and upwards. faster than an airplane but not 'zooming fast'. i watched until i was physically shaking too much and was afraid i'd get a migrain like i had in previous sightings. i couldn't stare any longer so i came inside. odd though, that it wasn't like i had never seen them before, so it didn't have that same "wow" effect. it was somehow like they were telling me something i already knew.

i would have taken a picture but they were too high in the sky and my camera would have never captured it.
content.summary: Two, maybe 3 lights. one light emiited off the other to make three. chevron shaped when illuminated

content.detailedDescription:
A friend and i were fishing at lewisville lake, in denton county, late at night. sometime after midnight, approx., we saw a bright, vertical line of white light forming in the western sky.

this line was slowing moving towards us and as it did, it seemed only the front edge was moving and leaving a long rectangular plane behind it. within the rectangle were sharp, equal bands of light, in different shades of white, about 7 bands.

there were no windows, or any sound. though it seemed to be moving slow and steady, it must have been travelling fast. it didn't glow, like with diffused light, but we couldn't see through it either. it seemed 2 dimensional, with a height of maybe a mile and a width of approximately 500 miles long. right above us, the leading edge of the rectangle made a sharp 90 degree turn to the south, with the remaining part of the rectangle still moving east until it hit that point, at which it bent and also turned to the south.

we watched this display for around 10-20 minutes. we never saw any structure. nothing was ever emitted from it. it didn't seem like any kind of craft. it was just like a huge and long light crossing the sky. it finally vanished into the south.

i've never seen any ufo report similar to this and i never reported it. i can't imagine what it was. 3 days after this event, i was searching the local newspaper, dallas morning news, to see if there was any report on it. there was a small report mentioned about a russian missle that had re-entered the atmosphere over our west coast, travelling east to oklahoma, then turning south, went over dallas, and houston before going out over the gulf and falling into the water.

my date and times are only approximate. i clearly remember the event and have grown more and more curious as to what i really saw. i know that it couldn't be any kind of missle or any satellite. it wasn't re-entering our atmosphere, there were no sparks or flames. it was travelling in a continuous direction east and then turning south. it never moved up or down and it only turned at that one point, the rectangle bending around one point so at the same time, there was the leading part heading south and a trailing part still heading east.

i also approximate the time it took to pass over us. i know it started south long before we ever saw the end of it and we could have watched it for more than 20 minutes or more, or even less. also, i think the event occurred sometime between the mid 1980's to 1990.

i've had my share of ridicule about this, but it really did happen. i don't make any claim as to what it was, i just don't know, nor do i have anything to compare it to. my only hope seems to be some entity like yours with much greater access to info than i have and active investigators.

can you tell me what i saw or at least know of others who also witnessed it or something similar to it?
content.summary: Two dimensional rectangle made up of 7 bands of differing shades of white, 1 mile high x 500 miles long.

content.detailedDescription: At home taking pictures of sky/clouds near sunset--facing south west. unsure of shape/size of object until i was able to view it enlarged on my pc. object appears to be a domed saucer shape when slightly enlarged. the left side is either entering or exiting the cloud.  a second picture was taken directly after without zooming in on the cloud-which also gives a better perspective of the distance.  both pictures were taken within a few seconds of each other.  nothing appears to be in the 2nd photo.  unsure of direction of object.
content.summary: Captured unknown object on digital camera while taking photos of sky/clouds near sunset.

content.detailedDescription:
Mid afternoon, well into the mohave during the early afternoon of 2-9-2012. about two hours drive out of trona, ca.

i felt a sudden sense of urgency to stop the car. i got out and walked around for a few minutes, looking around but noticed nothing. i started snapping photos of the surrounding area. did not notice anything unusual  with the photos until today when i started reviewing them on my computer. it appears i captured lights and perhaps a shadow of something larger and smaller lights around the periphery. larger object appears to be transparent. if a reflection, not sure of what, since there was nothing around me, no other vehicles and not a cloud in the sky. one of the lights appears to be emitting, as you can clearly see the edges. i saw nothing and heard nothing at the time. i saw no air craft and was looking for china lake jet patrols but saw none. i have one photo saved on the original memory card at the time the photo was taken. i have attached it here.

i wish i had more information to offer, but as earlier stated, i did not see anything that day, so perhaps this is nothing, but maybe...It could be something....
content.summary: Something transparent with lights in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures of the vegetable garden and noticed weird clouds and an arrow cloud.  i took 5 photos of the clouds.  the next day while looking at the pictures on my computer i noticed a spot on one of the photographs and zoomed on it and saw a brown triangle ufo.  while i was taking the pictures there were no helicopters, planes or birds in the sky so i don���t know what that was but i didn���t see it with my naked eye, only later on my computer.
content.summary: Triangle ufo near pbia wpb fl

content.detailedDescription:
I was visiting someone's backyard, enjoying a nice camp fire with three others when something got my attention. i looked up to see this reddish/pink light orb glowing quite largely in the sky. it was beautiful, couldn't take my eyes off of it as it seemed like pure light shining brightly in the night sky. i did not know what it was, but it felt like brilliant pure love.

it looked like a single firework lit up, only it held its perfectly circular orb-like form and was consistently glowing its warm radiant light as if it were a living photograph. i felt like it had its own consciousness and was communicating on a higher level. i wanted to let my partner who was sitting right next to me know but for some reason i felt like it was there to communicate with me. the lights within were perfectly dispersed to form its sphere with a main bright reddish light as its core. the light was slightly transparent when i first noticed it in its expanded form.

it hovered there for a few minutes as i was in complete amazement, then it became condensed, (a little bigger than a planet and glowing reddish) as it travelled across the sky beyond the trees in the distance.
content.summary: Reddish/pink orb sighted hovering and expanded in form, became star-sized then travelled southwest from the sighted location

content.detailedDescription: Jets had been flying in the area and went outside on feb 13,2012 to watch them when i noticed a triangular shaped craft fling at lower altitude and very slow.It had big round white lights not to bright with a reddish orange light in center that were not blinking,no other lights were visible.I went in to get my camera, but when i returned it was gone. the jets were still flying around the next day, so decided to film them as they flew around. on feb 16,2012 i was out in the early evening filming when i transfered my shots to check them out, i noticed that there were objects flying by these jets. i did not notice them while filming.I do not know what the triangular craft was that i saw, but it was not any kind of aircraft using jet engines, it was moving way slower than a small plane, and there was no sound from it at all. as for the objects in the film, i have know idea.
content.summary: Observed triangle shaped object moving slowly, filmed objects flying near fighter jets

content.detailedDescription:
My daughter and myself were driving down highway 10 on the evening of february 17, 2012.  i seen lights that seemed quite close to the ground, i told my daughter kind of jokingly, look, a ufo.  since i had to also keep a eye on the road, she said no, that is the top of the water tower in mounds view, i said, no, we are still at least five blocks from the water tower.  i looked again, as we were passing it, it was a large black triangle with lights only on one angle, it seemed to be tilted and hovering in one spot, not moveing.  she sat and stared also and said oh my gosh mom, what is that?  i said let's circle the block and check it out!  we both had hair standing on edge.  as we got to the next block where we could take a left to head in that direction, we lost it in the tree line, i said, it is o.K. we will catch it when we turn the corner.  well, as we turned the corner, there was absolutely nothing.  we were baffled.  so we drove back up highway 10 and recreated our drive.  nothing!  

now, i know there is a small anoka county airport about ten miles up the nearest interstate, but if it would of been something waiting to land, we would of seen it as we turned the corner, it could of only been 60 seconds that it was out of our site, i just know others had to see this too.
content.summary: Large black triangle hovering 500ft

content.detailedDescription: I was in my car riding out in the country when i saw three dots manifest. they were in a triangle shape. then several smaller orbs manifested and started to fly around it. the main craft was stationary with the other crafts orbiting it for about two minutes before taking off at lightning speed. it did not scare me because i am a paranormal investigator and have witnessed ufos before.
content.summary: There was triangle made of 3 dots with orbs surrounding it

content.detailedDescription: Mike and i were looking out my bedroom window when i saw the light heading towards our house at what looked like low-altitude.  it's path of flight, speed, and singular light maybe suggested a helicopter, but we ran down the stairs and outside to the back yard patio to witness it fly over the house and it was completely to my surprise, noiseless.  the light on it was very erie and had the quality of an l.E.D. type of light where if you would look at it directly, it would be brighter than from the side, but as the light moved over us and passed over the hilltop out of view it never really dimmed.  instead the light had this odd sputtering quality as if the light itself were a form of propulsion, but again, it was completely noiseless, so how could that be?  it does not fit the profile of any human craft i can think of.  we couldn't even see any structure or size to the object outside of the light (which wasn't blindingly bright but modestly bright).  it's trajectory seemed very straight-line and purposeful.  it seemed like it glided very smoothly at a perfect, unwavering speed.  we lost sight of the object just short of it passing over the hill-top out of view when it sputtered out completely and was not seen again.  when we got outside on the back patio, that's when mike started shooting the video with his iphone.  he emailed it to me and i'm sending it to you for your inspection.
content.summary: Just a singular bright orangish red light that sputtered irregularly and cast no shadows and made no noise.  couldn't see any vehicle shape behind the light.

content.detailedDescription: I saw two objects in the sky.  they were brighter than other stars and moved over the course of the night.  they didn't make any noise.  one of them "disappeared" around 9pm.  the higher elevated one i believe was still there at 6 in the morning the following day.
content.summary: 2 orbs in sky

content.detailedDescription: I saw the object outside at about 7pm.  above it was another object that i had been seeing for several days.  i took pictures of them from the same spot on my deck at various times during the sighting.  they move west and descend as they normally do (these sightings have been occurring since lat jan.)  one lower object was gone at about 9.  the higher elevated one was gone about 9:15pm.
content.summary: 2 objects in the sky moving west

content.detailedDescription: 1030pm asked wife if car windos shut says no aparments have a back exit to parking  very cold wind is blowing sleet verticly as soon as i walk out the building its just above a privte fence i thought someone paid alot of money for that ballon i went shut window  going back the object moved j beside a transformer on the pole it was hovering at 45 degree i thought its taking juice from the transformer iwas going to run back to the aper  but decided to see what this thing was going to do so i raised my coller up and waited watch it for 3 to 5 min the object moved bcak into the darkness and that is it   this object had large chrismas lights did not make any noise  it was under a telephone  light it was a clear view  i had no reaction it was just very very cold night my wife went out with me but she ran back to the apart inever told anyone seems  i brought it upit up a few conversations no one is enterested so this is my story like all the other storys
content.summary: Wedding cake

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work and turned onto miccosukkee road from hillcrest street at 10:45 pm and saw a steady red light fairly large sized above a church yard across the street, i thought this was odd because lifeflight usually flies in from this direction towards the hospital but this was a steady red light and there was no helicopter sound. when i turned onto terrace street i discovered that it was moving away from the hospital and was moving away from me (toward the west) at a quick but steady pace. it was hard to keep an eye on it with the trees and old, tall houses in my neighborhood. i didn't know that it had gotten so far away so quickly until i pulled into my driveway and stopped moving to try and see what it was between a break in two trees. it was stationary and red, then started to pulsate white and red all over alternately then headed north and at a slight upward angle towards the cloud cover we had tonight. it then took off at that angle (looking like a small meteorite streak). it had to be 10:47 when it left because that is when i called my husband to tell him what i saw.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw steady red light in one location that moved steadily but quickly from east to west, pulsated red and white then took off to north.

content.detailedDescription: 1030pm asked wife if car windos shut says no aparments have a back exit to parking  very cold wind is blowing sleet verticly as soon as i walk out the building its just above a privte fence i thought someone paid alot of money for that ballon i went shut window  going back the object moved j beside a transformer on the pole it was hovering at 45 degree i thought its taking juice from the transformer iwas going to run back to the aper  but decided to see what this thing was going to do so i raised my coller up and waited watch it for 3 to 5 min the object moved bcak into the darkness and that is it   this object had large chrismas lights did not make any noise  it was under a telephone  light it was a clear view  i had no reaction it was just very very cold night my wife went out with me but she ran back to the apart inever told anyone seems  i brought it upit up a few conversations no one is enterested so this is my story like all the other storys
content.summary: Wedding cake

content.detailedDescription: While driving to work this morning i observed a solid light grey rectangular object slowly gliding from east to west in front of my car. i was traveling at about 40 mph, going north on gilbert rd, mesa az.  at first, i thought it might be something like a sign being pulled by a plane for advertising purposes, but quickly realized there was nothing pulling it. i did not at first perceive it moving at all and since i was driving directly towards it, that i would be able to clearly see more detail as i approached. but as i got further along, i realized it was flying from my right to left in the sky and seemed to be gradually descending.  i did manage to snap a picture with my phone, but detail is lacking as it was quite a distance away by the time i managed to take the shot from my moving car.
content.summary: Driving north 9:15 am observed from my car a rectangular solid dull gray object slowly gliding east to west

content.detailedDescription: I came out of mall, and two people were staring up at sky, so i stopped to look too. the woman said there was a ufo. sure enough there was a weird moving light that was flashing, sometimes white, then red, but it wasn't moving straight. i watched it for about a minute. and then it disappeared. it was cloudy. there was no noise. interesting.
content.summary: I came out of mall, and two people were staring up at sky, so i stopped to look too. the woman said there was a ufo. sure enough there was a weird moving light that was flashing, sometimes white, then red, but it wasn't moving straight.

content.detailedDescription:
Id like to add this sighting to mufons data base.
about a year ago i was coming home after work.
it was early evening but dark.
up over the hills was a string of glowing light balls.
first one then 2 then 3 this there must have been 2 dozen sight balls brightly glowing in a line,after a few minutes.
one would appear then the next in line would slowly appear and get brightest slowly and so on.
i stopped the car and looked.
there was a loud sound that lasted a few minutes.
the sound was like jet plane after burners.
but more like a group of jets on after burners,very loud and went on for atleast 10 minutes.
the long string of glowing balls would suddenly go out in the line,one after the other.
if you have ever seen the video of the string of glowing balls in the evening above the mountains that was made,i believe in the scottsdale,arizona area,some years back and has been on tv,you will have seen exactly the sighting i had.
the us military uses this area and surounding areas of 100 miles for flight practice.You often hear their very loud and low engines when its storming.
these odd and bright string of weird acting bright glowing balls in a string may well be decoys for heat seeking missiles and the loud jet engine noises may well be the fighters distanceing themselves as very fast as possable from the decoys.
the glowing balls were silent.
content.summary: String of oddly acting bright glowing balls in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 8:08 pm, est, february 17, 2012, i witnessed the recurring bright white light that i have observed at least 5 times previously.  as i stepped onto my front porch i spotted the light above the western slope of the same nearby mountain where this event had occurred in the past; the light appeared  to be approx 400' - 500' above the horizon in the northwestern sky (almost directly below venus).  as i continued to observe, the light began moving horizontally very slowly in a northerly direction and at the same time the altitude was dropping slowly.  this horizontal and vertical movement continued until approximately 8:24 pm.  during this period of time i observed that the light dimmed and brightened 3 times.  by 8:41 the light then began to descend more quickly and by 8:54 pm it had dropped below the tree-line.
content.summary: At approximately 8:08 pm, est, february 17, 2012, i witnessed the recurring bright white light that i have observed at least 5 times previously.  as i stepped onto my front porch i spotted the light above the western slope of the same nearby mountain wher

content.detailedDescription:
i looked up to watch passing commercial jets high in the sky and all of a sudden i saw a silent triangle with faint lights glide over me from east to west. appeared 5,000 feet to 18,000 feet. it appeared very large maybe 1,000 feet across. 
i am a pilot and know this was no airplane i have ever seen. it appeared to glide past at high rate of speed. it was amazing as it glided towards the ocean heading 240 degrees to the west.
content.summary: Silent huge triangle with faint white light on leading edge may have had six light on each wing

content.detailedDescription: I live on a 12 ac small ranch. i have a couple of cows and horses, but my neighbors have pasters that separate our homes. and they have several heads of cattle. for about one month  my adult son and i while outside have noticed these orange/yellow like orbs hoovering to the left of our property. we noticed them because they were so bright, strange in color, not moving just hoovering, and very close to our cabin. we do live close to a small airport, so we are use to seeing planes, but never seen anything like this. no plane can hoover, and if it was a helicopter, this orb was close enough to hear.  they were close enough that i could get pics on my digital camera. last week i counted 7 of them straight in line hoovering behind my cabin and they all disappear at the same time. everytime we see them, they stay for a couple of hours, when i start taking pics or looking thru ir night vision, it will fade away, but come back slowly. but for the last week, this one orb shows up at the same place at the same time. it will fade away then come back, sometimes it gets even brighter when it comes back, but i assume its because its getting closer. it moves and disappers. i stopped my neighbor tonight and told him what we have been seeing, and pointed it out to him. he said " he knew, him and his girlfriend have been watching it too the last few nights". 2 weeks ago my son said" he felt a vibration that felt like it was going thru his chest, then a loud humming. it was so bad he had to cover his ears". he said" he was screaming my name, i was right next to him, but i wouldn't wake up. my ex-husband lives 7 miles from us, two days after this humming he also heard a humming that made his head hurt. we had not discused this at all till a week later and found out they both experinced the same feeling and humming. when we looked thru the ir night vision, (this happened to me and my son) a light got real bright in the lense, and my son and i got headaches and sick on our stomachs. when i walk outside now, i have a very uneasy feeling. i know this sounds weird, but i feel like i'm always being watched, its just a creepy feeling. it show up every night!! it just moves away slowly then fades away. it's been a clear night everynight, tonight its cloudy and the orb left early.
content.summary: A very bright orange/yellow light that hoover in erratic directions, circles, zig zags, fazing in n out for about 2 hours

content.detailedDescription:
Went to look out the back door at work around 7pm. towards mount ascutney in vt. it was three white lights in a triangle pattern, with a center green blue light with a milde glow in the middle, in a mild cloud cover. thought it might be stars through the clouds, or a house across the valley. but the angle was to great to be a house on the mountain on the other side of the river. i went out at 7:15 and the clouds had moved, the lights were gone, there were no stars in that pattern, and the angle was to high to be something on the mountain. 
     when i was looking at it, it was like they were trying to send images telepathically, mentally like trying to communicate. i felt a bit warm, and there was a feeling of electro-magneteic, or dry static elcectricity feeling, with a metalic taste in my mouth.  i do work in a mahcine shop metal working, but this was like the tast of maybe blood taste. if you cut your finger and try to stop the bleeding. that taste. it was like a residue for over two hours after they left. 
    the images were of like star patterns, or star charts, like a flight path map you would see of the us and all the flights, connected from air port to airport. also there were symbals, and geometric shapes that i did not understand, or could reporduce, they were very detailed.  it was to intense and fast, like downloading of the inernet very fast. 
i feel that i had had a close encounter. 
the vessel was about a mile away approx. 45 deg angle from  where i was, so i would put it at about 3000 ft agl. but i will always remeber the feeling i got, like a hotflash during what i feel was some kind of communication.  i will never forget this experience.
content.summary: Looked out back at, work saw three lights in cloud cover.

content.detailedDescription: I was next to my window on my laptop. i have just watched an documentary about aliens in earth past. my window faces a major airport which i am use to seeing lights in the sky. though this one caught my eye due to its size and color. it was red and the size was about star-like. i assumed it was a newly born star but as i looked closer i noticed it had blue lights to the left side of it. my younger brothers and cousins also saw the strange light. the object also seemed to wobble a little as it hovered. after about five minutes we stopped worrying about it. though about 3 minutes later i look back and it was gone. i instantly knew it was a star nor a plane. what i saw matched the description of a ufo!
content.summary: A light that was red and had smaller blue lights to its left side.
